(function(){
  'use strict';
 
  var module = angular.module('multi-transclude', []);
 
  var Ctrl = [ '$element', '$compile', function($element, $compile){
    var ctrl = this;
 
    // There's not a good way to ask Angular to give you the closest
    // controller from a list of controllers, we get all multi-transclude
    // controllers and select the one that is the child of the other.
    ctrl.$element = $element;
    ctrl.isChildOf = function(otherCtrl){
      return otherCtrl.$element[0].contains(ctrl.$element[0]);
    };
 
    var blocks = {};
    ctrl.register = function(name, block){
      blocks[name] = block;
    };
 
    ctrl.render = function(name, target, scope){
      var block = blocks[name];
      block(scope, function(clone){
        target.empty();
        target.append(clone);
      });
    };
  }];
 
  module.directive('ngMultiTemplate', [
    '$compile',
    function($compile){
      return {
        terminal: true,
        templateUrl: function(element, attrs){
          return attrs.ngMultiTemplate;
        },
        controller: Ctrl,
        compile: function($element, $attrs){
          var children = {};
          angular.forEach($element.children(), function(child){
            var $child = angular.element(child);
            children[$child.attr('name')] = $compile($child.html());
          });
 
          $element.empty();
 
          return {
            pre: function(scope, element, attrs, ctrl){
              angular.forEach(children, function(block, name){
                ctrl.register(name, block);
              });
            }
          };
        }
      };
    }
  ]);
 
  module.directive('ngMultiTransclude', function(){
    return {
      require: ['?^ngMultiTranscludeController', '?^ngMultiTemplate'],
      link: function(scope, element, attrs, ctrls){
        // Find the deepest controller (closes to this element).
        var ctrl1 = ctrls[0];
        var ctrl2 = ctrls[1];
        var ctrl;
        Iif(ctrl1 && ctrl2){
          ctrl = ctrl1.isChildOf(ctrl2) ? ctrl1 : ctrl2;
        }
        else {
          ctrl = ctrl1 || ctrl2;
        }
 
        // A multi-transclude parent directive must be present.
        Eif(!ctrl){
          throw new Error('Illegal use of ngMultiTransclude. No wrapping controller.');
        }
 
        // Receive transcluded content.
        ctrl.render(attrs.ngMultiTransclude, element);
      }
    };
  });
})();
